scripts.confgen: npx ts-node --transpile-only ../../src/index.ts vite typescript library:BackendLib node:fs codegen:resolvers:schema eslint prettier
scripts.all: yarn && yarn build && yarn fix && yarn check:types && echo ðŸŽ‰ Did all
scripts.build:types: tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly -p tsconfig.json --skipLibCheck && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json && mv dist/index.d.ts dist/index.umd.d.ts
scripts.check:types: tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.json; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBUeXBlcyBhcmUgZ29vZCEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
scripts.check:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore .; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
scripts.fix:lint: eslint --ignore-path .gitignore . --fix; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 8J+OiSBObyBsaW50IGluIHRoaXMgY29kZSEKCg== | base64 -d; else exit 1; fi
